You can delete messages in 24 hours only.
If you delete only for me, your friend's chat history will remain.
chats-main.If you delete both friends and me, the c: If you delete both friends and me, the chat history will be deleted for you and all your friends.
chats-main.The chat room will be maintained even if: The chat room will be maintained even if you (owner) leave. Also, you cannot see all chat history when coming back.

general.You can manage your all devices includin: You can manage your all devices including mobile and desktop.
general.You can reregister your current device i:
You can reregister your current device if you change your device or if someone is using your Kok Kok account
without your consent.
general.You will be logged out if you deregsiter: You will be logged out if you deregsiter your current device. You can re-register your device anytime.

notifications.Notifications disabled in your device se: Notifications disabled in your device settings.
notifications.Please enable the device notifications i: Please enable the device notifications in order to recieve Kok Kok notifications.
notifications.When a push notification arrives, it sho: When a push notification arrives, it shows a part of the message.
notifications.Price change, trade completion, suggesti: Price change, trade completion, suggestion and keyword alert
notifications.You can get notifications by e-mail as w: You can get notifications by e-mail as well
notifications.You should register E-mail to get notifi: You should register E-mail to get notifications by e-mail. Please Register E-mail.
notifications.Are you sure you want to reset all notif: Are you sure you want to reset all notification settings to default?

privacy.You won't see last seen and online statu:
You won't see last seen and online statuses for people
with whom you don't share yours.
privacy.Approximate last seen will be shown inst:
Approximate last seen will be shown instead
(recently, within a week, within a month)
privacy.You can restrict who can see your profil: You can restrict who can see your profile photo.
privacy.You can restrict who can call you by voi: You can restrict who can call you by voice call.
privacy.You can restrict who call you by video c: You can restrict who call you by video call.
privacy.You can restrict who can add you to grou: You can restrict who can add you to group call.
privacy.Kok Kok users in your contacts will be a: Kok Kok users in your contacts will be automatically synced to you friends list.
privacy.When you set up an additional passcode,: When you set up an additional passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page.
privacy.Tap it to lock and unlock the app: Tap it to lock and unlock the app
privacy.If you forget the passcode, you'll need: If you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app.
privacy.You can restrict people who can see and:
You can restrict people who can see and follow your Kok Kok Me by turning On/Off
of Private account.
privacy.With private account, only your follower: With private account, only your followers can see your all activities on Kok Kok Me.
privacy.People should send you follow requests t: People should send you follow requests to follow you.
privacy.Anyone can see your all activities on Ko: Anyone can see your all activities on Kok Kok Me and follow you without your acceptance.
privacy.You can manage users who can see your po: You can manage users who can see your posts on Kok Kok Me.
privacy.You can manage users who can watch your: You can manage users who can watch your live on Kok Kok Me.
privacy.You can manage users who can tag you on: You can manage users who can tag you on their post and live.
privacy.Friends excepted cannot see your activit:
Friends excepted cannot see your activities
on Kok Kok Me
privacy.Make Followers to enjoy Kok Kok Me: Make Followers to enjoy Kok Kok Me
privacy.Follow users to enjoy Kok Kok Me: Follow users to enjoy Kok Kok Me
privacy.You can only manage users that all activ:
You can only manage users that all activities are hidden on this page. To hide some users’ activities is
              avavailable on thier Kok Kok Me.
privacy.You can restrict who can see your birthd: You can restrict who can see your birthday.
privacy.You can restrict what to show your birth: You can restrict what to show your birthday on the profile
privacy.1) It does not appear in the friend list: 1) It does not appear in the friend list.
privacy.2) Blocked users cannot search for you o: 2) Blocked users cannot search for you or add you as friends.
privacy.3) It does not appear in my SNS posts an: 3) It does not appear in my SNS posts and comments
privacy.However, you can be invited to group cha: However, you can be invited to group chat, group voice chat, and group video chat.
privacy.At this time, the blocked friends mark i: At this time, the blocked friends mark is only shown to you.
privacy.Add friends to chat with them: Add friends to chat with them

chatting.All conversation history will be deleted: All conversation history will be deleted and all chatrooms will be removed from your chat list.
chatting.Are you sure you want to clear all chat: Are you sure you want to clear all chat messages?
chatting.Only text messages are included, except: Only text messages are included, except for media.
chatting.Cached data is temporary data generated:
Cached data is temporary data generated when using Kok Kok.
It doesn’t include media files shared in chatrooms.
chatting.Are you sure you want to clear cached da: Are you sure you want to clear cached data?
chatting.Media files including Photos, Videos, an: Media files including Photos, Videos, and Voice messages in chatrooms will be maintained.
chatting.You are using the latest version: You are using the latest version
